timelineData.event: Bachelor of Engineering from Mumbai University
timelineData.details: Graduated with a degree in Computer Engineering. Learned fundamental principles of software development and computer science.

timelineData.event: Software Engineering Internship at Sun Valley Tech
timelineData.details: Gained hands-on experience in software development. Worked on various projects involving web technologies and database management.

timelineData.event: MS in Computer Science From SUNY Buffalo
timelineData.details: Pursued advanced studies in computer science, focusing on areas such as artificial intelligence, data structures, and algorithms.

timelineData.event: Software Engineer at Royal Cyber Inc
timelineData.details: Started professional career as a software engineer. Worked on enterprise-level applications and improved coding skills.
Specialized in data analytics and web tracking solutions. Developed expertise in handling large datasets and creating insightful reports.
Contributed to automotive software systems. Gained experience in working with complex, large-scale projects in a corporate environment.

timelineData.event: Software Engineer at Ernst and Young
timelineData.details: Worked on financial software solutions. Developed skills in creating secure and compliant applications for the finance sector.
Transitioned to a leadership role. Managed large-scale technical projects and coordinated cross-functional teams to deliver innovative solutions.
Currently leading cybersecurity initiatives. Combining technical expertise with project management skills to drive cutting-edge security solutions.
